snippet: Oklahoma City guard Russell Westbrook will not participate in the World Cup of Basketball this summer so he can rest some previous knee injuries.
abstract: Oklahoma City Thunder guard Russell Westbrook will not participate in World Cup of Basketball in summer 2014, opting instead to rest some previous knee injuries.
lead_paragraph: Oklahoma City guard Russell Westbrook will not participate in the World Cup of Basketball this summer so he can rest some previous knee injuries.

headline.main: Injuries Keep Westbrook Off World Cup Roster
